channel.title: Demolitionx
channel.description:
Hey mopar! So some people called Forge Of Empires stole my last idea and apparently copy righted it.... So I'm back into rsps! I will be creating a server that is 667 loading the most recent cache released to the people. Currently 711. I am basing this server off of Optimus Scape 711. Please do not flame and or call me a leecher because I am not releasing this into beta till I edit and improve the server greatly. This post will be edited by a friend I have appointed to release all development and advertisement posts. Thank you.
Below I will be filling out the requirements and application formats for each staff position. [u][b][size=12pt]IN-GAME[/size][/b][/u]
[b][u][size=8pt]REQUIREMENTS[/size][/u][/b] [b]Online Time[/b] [b]Current Position[/b] [u]Moderator[/u] - 2 Hours a day. None. [u]Head Moderator[/u] 2 Hours a day. Moderator [u]Administrator[/u] 3 Hours a day. Head Moderator [u]Head Administrator[/u] 3 Hours a day. Administrator [u]Co-Owner[/u] 4 Hours a day. Head Administrator [u]Coder[/u] 4 Hours a day. NONE [u]Beta-Tester[/u] 4 Hours a day. Moparscape Member.
Format for all: Name: Position Applying For: Age: Location: Past Positions: Current Position: More Information: Extra Work:
[u][size=12pt][b]FORUM[/b][/size][/u] Name: Position Applying For: Age: Location: Past Positions: Current Position: More Information: Extra Work:
Please Post What Position You Want For Forums!
[size=18pt][b][i][u]Supporters![/u][/i][/b][/size] -Kronixz -Devenb123 - - - - - - - - - - I have uploaded videos of PVP, Trading, and duel.
PVP [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0Duupg57qs0&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
Trading [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DvcMmjwkBaU&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
Duel Arena [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lPPQ6_5BtNk&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

item.title: Demolitionx

item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Name: Nolan
Position Applying For: Moderator
Age: 17
Location: United States (Kentucky)
Past Positions: Server-Developer/ Administrator/ Moderator, Forum-Developer/ Administrator/ Moderator
Current Position: None.
More Information: I have filled every position on every revision, except 711 which is why I am looking to expand my knowledge and experience.
Extra Work: N/A

Read full topic
